player_command.description: Search for a Clash of Clans player
player_command.response:
👤 Player: **{name}**
🏆 Current Trophies: **{trophies}**
🥇 Best Trophies: **{bestTrophies}**
🏰 Town Hall Level: **{townHallLevel}**
🎖️ War Stars: **{warStars}**
⚔️ Attack Wins: **{attackWins}**
🛡️ Defense Wins: **{defenseWins}**
🏛️ Clan: **{clanName}**
🏅 Experience Level: **{level}**
player_command.error_description: There was an issue fetching the player data. Please try again later.
